= Building `sbt` =

[http://code.google.com/p/simple-build-tool/source/checkout Checkout] `sbt` from the subversion repository.

Compile the sources in `sbt/` using Scala 2.7.2 (or higher) and then package the classes and the scalac-plugin.xml file in `sbt.jar`. 

You can use the bash script `build` in the root directory for this.  Alternatively, if you already have the latest release of `sbt` on your system, you can build use `sbt` to build itself.
